...then we can encode that relationship by wrapping the <mark>add</mark> and del with the substitution element subst. For...
..., we would encode the additional "some" using the <mark>add</mark> element:
...these are a related substitution, we wrap the <mark>add</mark> and the del in a subst. So putting...
...is unclear, or possible other readings, then <mark>add</mark> a note beside the unclear using the note element...
